m_szDocTitle: Audi will lead fuel cell cars for VW Group
m_szDocSumamry: Audi will lead fuel cell cars for VW Group Audi says the H-tron quattro concept's aerodynamic design helps to reduce fuel use. Automotive News Europe March 9, 2016 06:01 CET INGOLSTADT, Germany -- Audi will lead Volkswagen Group's development efforts in emissions-free hydrogen fuel cell cars to better position the brand as a innovation leader, its executives said. Audi has assumed the lead function as the group's "center of excellence" for fuel cells.
